left_text: Antenna of male rather short, reaching propodeum, entirely yellow, ﬁrst ﬂagellar segment over 0.7 times as long as second; last ﬂagellar segment of male tapering to blunt point (Fig. 112-8d) (nearctic)
right_text: Antenna of male reaching beyond propodeum, black, ﬂagellum red-yellow beneath, ﬁrst ﬂagellar segment nearly 0.6 times as long as second; last ﬂagellar segment of male with ordinary rounded apex (South America)
